data.title: Sincura Tickets
data.meta_description: VIP tickets to all Darts events, including the PDC World Championships at Alexandra Palace, Premier League, World Tour and World Cup.
data.text:
ENJOY PREMIUM TICKETS, HOSPITALITY, VIP SEATS AND PRIVATE BOXES AT ALL MAJOR DARTS TOURNAMENTS FROM THE PDC WORLD DARTS CHAMPIONSHIP TO THE PREMIER LEAGUE AT UNBEATABLE PRICES WITH THE WORLD'S NUMBER ONE CONCIERGE

The Sincura Tickets team have two mission statements; to be able to source any ticket for any event and to beat the market prices.

We have exceeded these expectations and now supply tickets to over 180 hotel concierges, credit card companies, and private and corporate clients both in the UK and Worldwide.

We are the primary market and provide tickets to other agencies.

Our hand selected team has over 50 yearsâ experience in the industry.

We are officially appointed to represent the leading venues, teams and events which include being selected as the VIP ticket partner for the London Olympics 2012 and the Rugby World Cup 2015.

Our dedicated tickets team are here to ensure your darts experience is second to none.

Sincura will assist you with everything from sourcing the best tickets to all tournaments, backstage access, arranging your transport, accommodation, red carpet photographers, hair and make-up and everything else.

Your personal concierge will introduce themselves, and is available to help with all your arrangements, and is on call 24/7 for all your needs from last minute requests and tickets to arrange your restaurants and nightlife.

All you need to do is turn up and we will take care of the rest.

No company does it better for the Darts - we look forward to sharing the 2024 VIP darts experience with you.

DOWNLOAD OUR APP

To see the available packages for any darts events - simply click on "Offers" from the home screen on your App and select the flag for the country you wish to see. Download the App from the link below

Enjoy the latest darts news, exclusive seating, offers, and a global concierge in your pocket with the Sincura Concierge App.

ð¯ PDC WORLD DARTS CHAMPIONSHIP 2024/25 - VIP TICKETS AND PACKAGES

DATES TBA (December 2024 - January 2025 - Alexandra Palace, London)

The world championships are the most prestigious of the PDC's tournaments, with the winner receiving the Sid Waddell Trophy, named in honour of the darts commentator Sid Waddell, who died in 2012.

The PDC World Darts Championship has produced some iconic moments over the years, starting with Fallon Sherrick becoming the first women to win a match at the championships in 2022, coming from 2-1 down to win 4-2, Van Barneveld beating Phil Taylor in the 'greatest game ever' we saw Michael Smith beat Michael Van Gerwin to a 9-darter and ultimatly to the championship in 2022/23 and most recently the rise of Luke Littler, who was overcome by Berkshire-born Luke Humpries in the final last year.

No matter the outcome, you can always expect drama and excitment at the PDC World Darts Championships.

ð¯ PREMIER LEAGUE - VIP TICKETS AND PACKAGES

February 1st 2024 - May 23rd 2024

Premier League Darts, played weekly from February to May, is now one of the biggest darts tournaments in the world.

The tournament will see eight of darts' top players play against each other in 16 mini-events during the season, with each league night comprimising of quarter-finals, semi-finals and a final oiver thye best of 11 legs.

The 2024 season begins at Cardiff's Utilita Arena on February 1, with the opening nightâs quarter-finals headlined by a blockbuster showdown between World Champion Humphries and teenage sensation Littler.

ð¯ WORLD CUP OF DARTS 2024

June 27th - June 30th 2024

The 2024 World Cup of Darts will take place from June 27-30 at the Eissporthalle, Frankfurt. The tournament will see 40 nations - each represented by two players - battle it out for TV silverware in group and knockout stage matches.
